summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Building Inspection Advisory, Examining and Appeals Board will convene on February 18, 2025, at 11:30 A.M. at the Oak Cliff Municipal Center. The meeting aims to discuss building inspection regulations and codes, ensuring compliance and safety standards within the city.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the January 21, 2025, meeting.
2. Review and recommendations for adopting the 2023 National Electrical Code, with amendments, as Chapter 56 "Dallas Electrical Code" of the Dallas City Code.
3. Briefing on proposed amendments to the International Residential Code.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will focus on significant updates to electrical safety standards through the adoption of the National Electrical Code, which will be integrated into local regulations. Additionally, there will be discussions regarding potential amendments to the International Residential Code, which may impact residential construction and safety protocols.

**Action Items**:  
The board will seek approval for the adoption of the updated electrical code and will consider recommendations for amendments to the International Residential Code. Stakeholders and interested parties are encouraged to register in advance to provide input during the meeting.
